CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 17, 1959, page 1, reads: "On Trail - Sixty-one-year-old Crawford Hines of 1847 Linton St., leaves Criminal Court, escorted by county deputy sheriffs during a recess in Hines' trial for the Aug. 10, 1958, shooting of his son-in-law, Emanuel Graham, of Dinwiddie St. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two police officers leading handcuffed Crawford Hines through courthouse hallway near Witness Room in the Allegheny County Courthouse
